名称: Peripheral Clock Control 0 Register
位宽: 16
作用: 使能不能的外设时钟
说明:  
    0       HRPWM clock enable
    1       reserved
    2       ePWM Module Time Base Clock Sync
    3       ACD clock enable
    4       I2C clock enable
    7-6     reserved
    8       SPI-A clock enable
    9       reserved
    10      SCI-A clock enable
    15:11   reserved
